name: IRON'ed IT Playtest
description:
Hello,

Before you press play: At any time, if you'd like to exit the game, press the ESC key.

Thanks for volunteering to test my game. 

This version of the game contains the tutorial and level 1. Please give feedback about your gaming experience and what you've learned below.

I know that there are a lot of esthetic pieces missing, feel free to leave comments on what you'd like to see. 

I would appreciate any feedback to improve the game for others.

 Thanks again! 

- Lois
